title: Fighting the Undertow
description: When the New England riptide sweeps Val into Ian's path, she's pulled into the erotic vortex of him and his friends. But she'll have to unravel dark secrets surrounding his brother's ghost before she can claim his heart. Publisher's Note: This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find objectionable: Anal play/intercourse, exhibitionism, group sex, menage (m/f/m, m/f/f).
author: Eden Rivers
